games.title: Our Games
games.description:
Explore our collection of retro-inspired arcade games.
Each game offers unique gameplay and challenges.

pong.description: Fast-paced table tennis action! Challenge your friends and smash your way to the high score.
explications: Move your paddle up and down using the w/s keys (P1) or up/down arrows (P2)
Hit the ball with your paddle to send it back to your opponent
Score points when your opponent misses the ball
First player to reach 10 points wins the game

dino.title: Dino Run
dino.description: A challenging endless runner where you control a dinosaur avoiding obstacles in a prehistoric landscape.
explications: Press space bar or up arrow to jump over cactus and other obstacles
Press down arrow to duck under flying pterodactyls
The game speeds up over time, making it increasingly difficult
Your score increases the longer you survive
Try to beat your high score with each attempt

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please read our terms of service carefully before using our platform.
terms.welcome: Welcome to FT_TRANSCENDANCE! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our retro gaming platform. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS
content: By creating an account, accessing, or using FT_TRANSCENDANCE, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy.
If you do not agree to these Terms, you must not access or use our service.

service.title: SERVICE DESCRIPTION
service.content: FT_TRANSCENDANCE is an online retro gaming platform that provides:
items: Classic arcade-style games and tournaments
Player statistics tracking and leaderboards
Social features including chat and friend systems
Customizable profiles and avatars

registration.title: ACCOUNT REGISTRATION
registration.content: To access certain features, you must create an account. You agree to:
items: Provide accurate and complete information
Maintain the security of your account credentials
Be responsible for all activities under your account
Notify us immediately of any unauthorized access

community.title: COMMUNITY GUIDELINES
community.content: We strive to maintain a positive gaming environment. You agree not to:
items: Engage in harassment, bullying, or toxic behavior
Use cheats, exploits, or unauthorized third-party software
Share inappropriate, offensive, or illegal content
Impersonate other users or create fake accounts
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
community.violations: Violations may result in warnings, temporary suspension, or permanent account termination.

intellectual.title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
intellectual.content: All content on FT_TRANSCENDANCE, including games, graphics, logos, music, and text, is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not:
items: Copy, distribute, or modify our content without permission
Use our trademarks or branding in unauthorized ways
Reverse engineer or attempt to extract source code

privacy.title: PRIVACY & DATA
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. We collect and use your data as described in our Privacy Policy, including:
items: Game statistics and performance data
Communication and social interaction logs
Technical information for service improvement

liability.title: LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
liability.content: FT_TRANSCENDANCE is provided "as is" without warranties. We are not liable for:
items: Service interruptions or technical issues
Actions of other users on the platform

termination.title: TERMINATION
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement:
items: You may delete your account at any time
We may suspend accounts for Terms violations

terms.footer: By using FT_TRANSCENDANCE, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms of Service.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.welcome: At StreamLine, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our services.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect different types of information to provide and improve our services:
items: Username, email address, password, and profile details
Messages and feedback you provide

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Manage your account
Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience
Ensure security and prevent fraud
Comply with legal obligations

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
items: When required by law or to protect our rights
When you explicitly agree to share your information

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information:
items: End-to-end encryption for data transmission
Access controls and authentication mechanisms
security.disclaimer: While we strive to protect your personal information, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We encourage you to use strong passwords and keep your account information confidential.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
items: Request a copy of your personal data we hold
Correct any inaccuracies in your personal data
Account deletion, on request, we will delete your account and all associated data
Portability, receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
items: Essential Cookies required for basic functionality and security
Functional Cookies to remember your preferences and settings

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy:
items: Account stored until you delete your account
Usage data stored for 2 years for analytics and service improvement

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place:
items: Standard Contractual Clauses for EU data transfers
Adequacy decisions by relevant data protection authorities
Binding Corporate Rules for intra-group transfers
Certification schemes and codes of conduct

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. When we make changes:
items: We will update the "Last updated" date at the top of this policy
Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated policy

privacy.footer: This privacy policy is effective as of the date last updated above and applies to all users of StreamLine services. By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this privacy policy.
